This returns a list of file handlers from the config file.

List list of class names (including package) for the file handler
Throws:
SWORDException - if there was a problem reading the config file

getFedoraURL

public java.lang.String getFedoraURL()
                              throws SWORDException
This returns the Fedora URL used when accessing the web services. It is in the form: http://host:port/fedora.

Returns:
String the Fedora access URL.
Throws:
SWORDException - if there was a problem reading the config file
